short_summary: Property management services, last day to reply is May 9th, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT
description: Property management services and other related services
full_summary:
# **08324-220028B - Request for Proposal (RFPP) for Property Management Services**

**Reference Number:** 
WS3889300355-Doc3905091701

**Solicitation Number:** WS3889300355

**Publication Date:** March 7, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** May 9, 2023, 2:00 pm Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

**Extension Notice:** Please disregard the original closing time. This notice is the only authorized file for this tender.

## **Background**

The Canadian government is seeking a contractor to provide property management services, lease administration, project delivery, and related optional services to the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (GAC) and the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

## **Key Details**

* **Contract Start Date:** June 15, 2023
* **Contract End Date:** October 10, 2023
* **Location of Work:** Europe
* **Service Category:** Property Management Services (UNSPSC Code: 80161601)
* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

## **Evaluation Criteria**

* **Technical Merit**
* **Price**
* Contractors with the highest combined rating will be selected.

## **Tenders Need to Meet the Following Requirements**

* All required documents, including a response to the RFP and bid submission, must be submitted by 2:00 pm EDT on May 9, 2023.
* Any bids submitted after 2:00 pm EDT may be considered non-compliant.

## **Authorized Contact Information**

For more information or to access the tender documents, visit the following URL:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15621653?extsite=MTU2MjE2NTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## **Bidders Notice**

By accessing and completing the Tender, Bidders expressly consent to abide by the rules and requirements outlined in this publication. Failure to do so will result in rejection of the Bid. It is the sole responsibility of the Bidder to confirm the accuracy of tender information and the documents referred to within. You can obtain technical assistance on how to submit your bid via the above-lnked website.



Please make sure to leave the **Expected Contract Dates**, **Location of Work**, **Service Category**,
